title: Bug 101187: Error when adding localization key
description: When trying to add a localization key, an error message stating 'Localization key can't be blank' is displayed. As a result, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When trying to add a localization key, an error message is displayed stating 'Localization key can't be blank'.
EB: The localization key should be accepted and the externalized text should be displayed in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the chart settings.
2. Attempt to set an externalized text in the chart title. Ensure that the 'Localization key' field is left blank.
3. Observe the error message stating 'Localization key can't be blank'.
